.4.meta_description: Couture collections of award winning pageant gowns at a fraction of retail costs.
.4.description:
We have partnered with the industries best designers to bring you the most sensational award winning gowns on the circuit today.


Our personal relationships with such top name designers as Sherri Hill, Mac Duggal and Tony Bowls allow us to get first hand knowledge of what the judges are seeking to crown you in your winning gown.


We have been making pageant girls dreams come true for years by offering top of the line collections at affordable prices accompanied by a worry-free shopping experience. 


=Benefits for the Pageant Girl=


*Your gown is ordered directly from the manufacturer. It is brand new, original and not shop worn. 

*Many designers offer made to order sizing.  Contact us for further details.

*We will include a high quality garment bag with all pageant gown orders to protect your investment. 

*Simple payment: We do not require you to pay for the gown in full at the time of ordering. All that's needed is a 25% deposit, and the balance is due at the time of shipment.  


We understand that purchasing your pageant gown is not only a major investment but also an experience that should be unforgettable. Give us a call and let our experienced staff assist you with your order!

.testimonials.description:
What Customers Are Saying about Onlineformals.com

Dear Michelle and Stephen I received the Sherri Hill dress I ordered this morning. It is stunning and beautifully made!!! My grand daughter will be delighted as she hasn't seen it yet. Thank you so much for the efficient service and prompt replies I have continued to have from you whilst waiting for this dress. I was concerned that it would arrive on time for my deadline date. As promised you delivered, for which I am extremely grateful. I shall certainly recommend you as an efficient and genuine service. Thank you again Kindest regards Diane Mort (A happy UK customer)

My experience with this company has been wonderful. Michelle was professional, courteous, and honest and her experience in the business manifested itself. I am extremely satisfied with the dress I purchased and my daughter absolutely loves her Sweet Sixteen Party dress. I will most certainly order from onlineformals.com again and recommend to others. Thanks again Michelle you are the BEST!!!! Tiffany

Hello -We received the dress and our daughter is thrilled with it!!!!!! It is exactly what she wanted!!!!!! Thanks for the prompt service and keeping us updated on the status of the dress. We would definitely order from you again and highly recommend you to our daughter's friends. Thanks again!! :)

Hi- I have received my touch up shoes and they are fab and they fit perfect and the 4 different color wrap arounds are great, would use your site again! Cheers- Sarah Brown

I just want to say I have received all of the Jovani gowns as well as the Terani and I am extremely happy with them! Thank you so much onlineformals for being so helpful and efficient with my orders!

I will be recommending onlineformals to my friends in the future... Rita

My order arrived today, right on time and it is beautiful. I wanted to let you know what a joy it was dealing with an online company that knows the meaning of customer service. Your phone reps and your online people were courteous, helpful and efficient. I will be certain to recommend this company to anyone looking for special occasion wear. Thank you.

I just wanted to say thank you for turning my evening occasion into a smashing success. I do not have the order number for my purchase but I wanted to let you know that the "word is out" about your company. The dress that I purchased from you by designer Tony Bowls caught the attention of EVERYONE. I received so many compliments about what I was wearing and I must have answered the question,"where did you get that dress?" at least 200 times. I made sure that with each response, ONLINEFORMALS.com was the first thing out of my mouth. I already know which dress will be ordered next.

Call it Karma if you wish but I clicked to your site strictly by accident and found the dress, in my size on clearance that day. The package arrived in the nick of time because I had to leave for my special occasion in less than one week of getting my order fulfilled. I will tell you that the dress was "presented" to an audience of about 10,000 (ten thousand) people and I was voted as the most beautifully attired woman that evening. I even received comments from men who were with their wives/significant others as to how marvelous I looked.

So in wrapping up my message, THANK YOU, THANK YOU, THANK YOU.

Signed,
A VERY satisfied customer

Michelle
I just received the dress, and I must tell you: it is the most amazing and beautiful dress I have ever owned! The size chart was so accurate that I dont think I even need to get alterations!!

Please thank everyone at Online Formals for the great customer service and the best prices anywhere. I will definitely order from you again!

Best regards,

Tiffany Brooks

Steve
Thank you so much for coming to our rescue. We received the gown two days ago and it is gorgeous. Yesterday we brought it for alterations. I have already recommended Online Formals to several people and have told them you and your staff really care about customer satisfaction and went above and beyond to make sure my daughter would be able to enjoy her special day. The teamwork you and Michelle demonstrated was unbelievable. I will continue to recommend you to everyone I come in contact who is looking for formal wear. I appreciate what you did more than you'll ever know. Every once in a while you come across someone who truly cares about accomplishing what they set out to do for their customers. You showed this by continuing to help my daughter find a gown that was not discontinued or sold out and by expediting shipment to ensure she received it in time for her prom. You demonstrated a sense of loyalty and commitment. . Thanks again!!!

Thank you so much for your great customer service. The dresses are here and they are everything that I dreamed of. I hope that I will be needed a dress for Miss Hawaii and will surely with no hesitation go through you again. You were amazing and the shipment came not a minute later than you said. I just want to say THANK YOU!!!! I hope you have a great day and will continue to run such a great business. - Miss Maui

Stephen
I just wanted to send you a quick note to let you know how pleased I am with your company and most importantly your service. You were so VERY helpful! From helping us choose a gown to letting us know when we will receive our delivery. (It came the exact day you promised) I was reluctant to order a gown online however when I called and spoke to you, you were more than willing to answer all my questions. And the reassurance I felt from you about the product and delivery eased every skeptical thought I had. So when the gown arrived, you can image how much more ecstatic I was to not only receive the gown on time but to have the gown look as it did online. The gown fit like a glove. (the only alterations needed is the length) Oh yeah, my daughter LOVES it too. LOL.

THANKS AGAIN!!! And Im sure you will be hearing from me again! -Michelle Veteri

Michelle-
Just a quick note to say THANK YOU! My daughter's dress arrived today as a direct ship and was even more beautiful in person. And it fits perfectly! Thank you for being such a pleasure to deal with!

Onlineformals-
Thank you soooo much!! We got the Jovani dress today and my daughter loves it so much. I will sing the praises of Onlineformals.com to everyone! -Tracey

Hi Stephen
Just want to say thanks for your prompt, professional and gracious service. I received my packages almost two weeks ago. Sorry for being so late saying thanks. Lately time just seem to go by so fast. I picked up my shoes and accessories yesterday and my alterations should be complete this week. I am anticipating a great evening but could not have pulled this off without you. Thanks again for everything. - Maxine

Hi Stephen
I just wanted to let you know that I received the dress today and it is perfect! I have never ordered a dress off line before and I am so glad that I did from your website. You were so helpful! Thank you so much for everything. -Liz Wilson

Dear Stephen
Thank you. This order was so simple and the dress is just devine. My daughter is so happy. Kind Regards -Holly Brown - Australia

Just wanted to tell you guys you have great customer service!!! Thank you.

I ordered a dress for my pageant recently and not only was the dress beautiful but, here sooner than the expected date. I spoke to an associate there and he reassured me that everything would be perfect and there was no need to worry. You all are great. I will have no problem ordering from onlineformals again. Thank you soooo much. God Bless - Sincerely, Krystiana Carr - Hampton, VA

Dear Mr. Winston,
We received the gown this morning, a day earlier than expected. Thank you so much for all your hard work. The dress fits perfectly and looks amazing. Thanks a Million, Paula Myers

Dear Stephen
Just a few photos of my daughter in her beautiful dress. It survived the beach , the gardens, the church, the reception and the party and she still looked amazing. Once again thank you. Regards, Valerie Stow

Hello Stephen,
I received the gown last Friday and I absolutely love it. Thank you so much for everything, you are great!!Agnes

Hi Steve
I wanted to say Thank You for everything! The gown is beautiful and it fits perfect! Sorry for being a pain....but I'm sure you're used to it, brides are crazy!! Thanks again and I'll refer you to anyone I know getting married! Amy Pinto

Stephen, I have received the faviana white dress and its perfect..thank you for the prompt /excellent service! I searched throughout the internet but I was thrilled you were so fast and courteous and even sent a shawl to coordinate with the dress. thanks again, I will most definately refer your services and will do business with you again in the future...Cindy Price/Tx

Onlineformals
I wanted to Thank You So Much... for making my daughter's prom the best ever. We received our gown 2 days after ordering. Super service... Casey - Pittsburgh,PA

Melissa
Thank you again for your wonderful service. I received so many compliments on my gown. I can't thank you enough. Lisa - Knoxville, TN

Stephen
The Absolute Best Online Experience Ever... Very knowledgeable staff, friendly and quick international shipping. My Wedding Day was a success thanks to onlineformals. Brianna - United Kingdom

Thank you Stephen,
I received the gown earlier than I expected and I am happy. Thanks for fast and high-quality service. Christine

Thanks you so much for helping me with my dress. I went to pick it up today, and i loved it! Thank you ! Mary - Virginia Beach

The dress arrived today and it fits perfect!!!! We are thrilled. Thank you so much. You can count on return business from us. - Kate and Bridgette Berg

I am writing to say thank you for all your help in getting the dress for my daughter. She is so happy and it is very beautiful on her. It arrived Friday 3/23 she is already for her prom this Friday and then one more in two weeks. Again thank you!! : )Christina Howard

Steve, I just wanted to let you know we received the gown on Thursday as you said and it is beautiful! Thank you for your help. The dress is perfect! Barbara Pelullo

Onlineformals-
I just received the dress today. It is absolutely gorgeous! Thank you so entirely much! and thanks for not charging for the gloves and shipping! I will definitely make sure to send you a picture. You've made my senior prom perfect! Thanks again!!

I received the dress today! I love it and it fits perfectly. Thank you so much for your excellent customer service. It was so awesome that you were always so quick to respond to my emails, even over the weekend. I will definitely shop with you again. Thanks again - Katie

Dear mr.Winston,
I have received the dress last tuesday and it is very beautiful. Thank you very much for everything. With kind regards, Tamara Pijpers - Netherlands

.sitenews.description:
Shipping Information

Domestic Shipping Transit Times


Free Shipping Promotion - Valid on orders over $200. All in stock merchandise will ship the following business day and be sent either Fed Ex Home Delivery or UPS Ground. Transit times vary by state.

Merchandise that is not in stock at our physical store location, but in stock at the manufacturer's warehouse will be ordered. Upon receipt (generally 3-5 business days) your order will promptly ship.

Fed Ex Home Delivery or UPS Ground Services (10-14 Days)- Transit times could be quicker depending upon stock availability and destination zip code.

Upgraded Shipping (6-10 Days) *Could be quicker based on destination zip code.

Expedited Shipping (2-4 Days)

International Shipping Transit Times


Fed Ex International Economy - (5-10 Days)

Fed Ex International Priority - (2-8 Days) Please contact us at info@onlineformals.com or by phone at 888-280-4179 with any questions.

.9c.q18: What if my package is lost or damaged during shipment?
.9c.a20: We forward via e-mail all package tracking information that is provided to us by the shipping carrier.
.9c.q25: Can I cancel my order after it has been placed on the site or via phone?
.9c.q5: Are the gowns you sell authentic?
.9c.a18: If your package is lost or damaged during shipment we ask that you immediately contact us via phone. We will research the shipment with our carrier and immediately issue you a replacement.
.9c.a21:
Should you find a lower price on the exact same item we carry in our online store - we will meet the price plus 5%. This applies only to in stock, non-sale, non-clearance merchandise from an authorized retailer.

The price must be verifiable by providing us with the URL of the exact same item being offered at a lower cost.

The Internet site must also have the companies full contact information clearly posted to include: Company Name, Address and Phone Number. There have been several reports of bogus/scam sites. Onlineformals.com is an Authorized verifiable retailer for each line we carry.

This offer doesn't apply to previously purchased merchandise and can't be combined with any current promotions.
.9c.a3: Yes. If you feel uncomfortable placing your order online we will be more than happy to accept your order over the phone. You will still receive the same online benefits such as order status, online tracking and payment confirmation.
.9c.a16:
Shipping Policies

All in-stock merchandise will ship within 1-2 business days. Merchandise that is not in stock will be special ordered from the manufacturer. Once received it will ship out to the customer within 1-2 business days. (Several manufacturer's drop ship - meaning they will ship the order direct to you) in this instance you will be notified via e-mail and e-mailed and/or sent a copy of your receipt.

We are aware of customer wear dates and ask that you provide the exact wear date in your order. This information enables us to determine whether or not we can get the merchandise and deliver it to you by your specified time frame.

Our shipment methods are viewable after you add an item to your shopping cart and proceed to checkout. If you are ever in doubt or have any special shipping requests please contact us toll free at 888-280-4179 or e-mail us at info@onlineformals.com
.9c.q2: How do I find my appropriate size after making my selection?
.9c.a2:
Reference the size chart for each manufacturer.  The size charts are located at the bottom of every page under our Customer Service category.


Find the size that corresponds to your measurements and make your selection from the drop-down menu in each product description. 


(Note)  If your size is in-between - we recommend choosing the larger size.  It is a lot easier for a seamstress to take a dress in than to let it out.


Record Your Sizes and reference them when making your selections.


Should you have any specific sizing questions or need assistance please contact us toll free at 888-280-4179 or via email at info@onlineformals.com
.9c.a22: Yes. Our store is located at 1556 Laskin Road in Virginia Beach, VA
.9c.q3: Do you accept orders over the phone?
.9c.q24: Do you ship to international destinations?
.9c.q20: Can I track my shipments online?
.9c.a1:
BUST - Measure around the fullest part of your bust section. (Without wearing a padded bra)

WAIST - Measure around your natural waistline making certain you keep the measuring tape snug, but not extremely tight.

HIPS - Measure around the fullest part of your hips. This is approximately 8" below your waistline for Misses Sizes, or 7" for Petite Sizes.
.9c.q16: How long will it take for my order to arrive after making my purchase?
.9c.q17: What if the item I order isn't in stock?
.9c.q21: What is your Low Price Guarantee?
.9c.a25: Once an order has been placed we immediately begin the fulfillment process with our warehouse, or the manufacturer.  Orders can't be cancelled once placed on the site.
.9c.a24:
Yes.  We ship worldwide using Federal Express.  This service provides fast international shipping with a point to point tracking service. 
Shipping charges are quoted on the website by placing an item in your shopping bag and proceeding to checkout.  After your address is entered a real time shipping quote will display.  We offer economy and priority services. Your shipping charge includes delivery only.  Some international countries may charge a customs fee or duty tax.  These are fees not charged by us, but rather your countries customs office.  Should you have any questions regarding potential customs fees please contact your local customs office, or postal service.
.9c.q1: How do I determine my size?
.9c.a17: If the item you order isn't in our store stock, we will contact the manufacturer direct in attempt to special order the gown. If the gown is in stock at the manufacturer and we can assure ourselves we can deliver it to you by your wear date we will proceed with the order. In instances where the item is not available we will promptly contact you and offer an exhange for a similar product and/or process an immediate refund.
.9c.a19:
Your satisfaction is important to us.

Onlineformals offers store credits on purchases (valid for a 1-year period) with the exception of the following items which are NOT returnable:

-Bridal Gowns

-Items Marked "Final Sale"

-Shoes

-Jewelry

-Undergarments

-Items purchased using a store credit from a previous return

We do not offer refunds and the conditions below must be met to process your return request:

You must e-mail us at returns@onlineformals.com within 5 days of receiving your item(s) and request a Return Authorization number. The subject must read RA Request. You must state the reason for your return in the message.

Your request will be reviewed and, if valid, you will be issued a Return Authorization number.

The merchandise must be mailed back within 3 days of receiving your Return Authorization number. *Please write your RA number on the outside of the box.

Merchandise must be mailed to:

Onlineformals, Inc.
2308 Pierce Lane
Virginia Beach, VA 23453

The merchandise must be sent back in the original packaging with all tags, hangers and receipts enclosed.

It is strongly suggested that you use UPS or Federal Express and ship your parcel fully insured. The United States Postal Service (Post Office) doesn't provide a point to point tracking service and is not recommended. *We are not responsible for any loss or damage of your returned shipment.

Upon receipt we will carefully inspect the merchandise for signs of wear to include: tears, snags, stains and odors. If the merchandise is damaged in any way it will be sent back at the buyers expense and we will not be able to provide store credit.

If the merchandise is received in new condition (as when shipped) we will provide a store credit for the amount of the item being returned less a $35.00 return fee. This fee covers our shipping costs associated with your new gown. If you need a more expedited method of shipment, please contact us for an express shipping price quote.

Store credits are valid for a period of one year from your original date of purchase. We will provide your store credit code via email. To redeem your store credit simply use the code at checkout when purchasing your new item.

Items purchased using a store credit are not returnable, meaning that once you receive your replacement item(s), it cannot be returned.

Any items sent back without a RA number will be sent back at the buyers expense.

Please call us at 888-280-4179 or e-mail us at info@onlineformals.com with any questions regarding our return policy.
.9c.a4:
Monday-Friday 8-5
Saturday - 8-1
Sunday - Closed

If we are unavailable to answer your call after business hours please leave a message or send us an e-mail. We monitor our site throughout the day and promptly respond to all inquires.
.9c.q22: Do you have a physical store location?
.9c.a5: Absolutely! Onlineformals.com is an authorized retailer for each designer we carry. We do not sell fake knock off dresses or any other product, as seen on many websites. We are Top Prom Website and Stop Fakes Website approved. We can also be found under the retailer section on the respective manufacturer websites. We are committed to making you feel confident you will receive an authentic dress when you place your order on Onlineformals.com
.9c.a23:
If you would like to place an item on layaway we require an initial 50% deposit at the time of order. The remaining balance will be due at the time of shipment.
Layaway items will be stored for a period of no more than 90 days. Should you fail to make final payment during that time your deposit will be forfeited.

.9b.meta_keywords: Size Charts, onlineformals, gown, dress, bridal, prom
.9b.description:
Please reference the specific manufacturer size chart when making your dress selections

-How To Measure-

BUST - Measure around the fullest part of your bust section. (Without wearing a padded bra)

WAIST - Measure around your natural waistline making certain you keep the measuring tape snug, but not extremely tight. Approximately 1 1/2" - 2" above your belly button.

HIPS - Measure around the fullest part of your hips. This is approximately 8" below your waistline for Misses Sizes, or 7" for Petite Sizes.

Tip: If your size is in-between we recommend choosing the larger size.
